context_bundle.content:
Microservice project initialization patterns.

Per-Service Structure:
/src - Service code
/tests - Unit and integration tests
/docker - Container configs
/k8s - Kubernetes manifests

Shared Infrastructure:
- Service mesh (Istio/Linkerd)
- API gateway (Kong/Ambassador)
- Message broker (Kafka/RabbitMQ)

Bootstrap Checklist:
1. Service template with health checks
2. Docker + docker-compose for local dev
3. CI/CD pipeline template
4. Observability stack (logs, metrics, traces)
